tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - Time to Talk Execution!

definition.text: We finished the definition of the rate and size targets. Let's define how we are going to take the position in terms of execution!

paragraphs.text: We are in the Open Execution section of the open stage! Go exploring the Execution Algorithm and the Market Sell Order I created!

I created the execution algo and the market order ahead of time so that I can reference them easily and take you to the right nodes during the tutorial. Both are in a freshly-created state, right as they'd be had you created them right now!
